tha-ap534:8.4: jinuttamo → anuttamo (bj, mr) | januttamo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap534:14.2: sattamake muni → ito sattamakehani (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | idha saddhādhimutto isi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap534:34.2: assāsayi → mamāha so (bj) | assāsayaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | mamāhasa (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap534:36.1: Punopi → punāpi (si, sya1ed, sya2ed) | muni maṃ (mr)
